messages.content: Create implementation plan for: a airbnb style booking app. i want the design to exactly like airbnb. first only generate the intiial search page

<plan>
  <overview>Building an Airbnb-style booking app with an exact replica of the search page. This will include the hero search section with location/date/guest inputs, property grid with filtering, and interactive map view. The initial implementation focuses on the search experience with mock data before connecting to real backend services.</overview>
  
  <steps>
    <step id="1" name="Backend API Structure" priority="high" dependencies="">
      <description>Set up FastAPI backend with property search models and endpoints</description>
      <files>
        <file path="backend/models/property.py">Property data models with location, pricing, amenities</file>
        <file path="backend/models/search.py">Search query parameters and response models</file>
        <file path="backend/services/search_service.py">Property search and filtering endpoints</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="2" name="Frontend Type Definitions" priority="high" dependencies="1">
      <description>Create TypeScript interfaces for property data and search functionality</description>
      <files>
        <file path="frontend/src/types/property.ts">Property type definitions matching backend models</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/types/search.ts">Search parameters and response types</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/services/api.ts">API service layer for property search</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="3" name="Search Components - Hero Section" priority="high" dependencies="2">
      <description>Create the hero search bar with location, check-in/out dates, and guest count</description>
      <files>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/search/SearchBar.tsx">Main search bar component</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/search/LocationInput.tsx">Location search with autocomplete</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/search/DateRangePicker.tsx">Check-in/out date picker</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/search/GuestSelector.tsx">Guest count selector with adults/children/pets</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="4" name="Property Grid Components" priority="high" dependencies="3">
      <description>Create property listing grid with cards and filtering sidebar</description>
      <files>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/property/PropertyCard.tsx">Individual property listing card</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/property/PropertyGrid.tsx">Responsive grid layout</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/search/FilterSidebar.tsx">Filtering sidebar with price range, property type, amenities</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="5" name="Map Integration" priority="medium" dependencies="4">
      <description>Add interactive map view with property markers</description>
      <files>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/map/PropertyMap.tsx">Interactive map with property markers</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/map/MapMarker.tsx">Custom map marker component</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/hooks/useMap.ts">Map interaction hooks</file>
      </files>
    </step>
    
    <step id="6" name="Search Page Assembly" priority="high" dependencies="5">
      <description>Assemble all components into the main search page with responsive layout</description>
      <files>
        <file path="frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx">Main search page with grid/map toggle</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/components/layout/SearchLayout.tsx">Responsive layout wrapper</file>
        <file path="frontend/src/App.tsx">Update routing to include search page</file>
      </files>
    </step>
  </steps>
  
  <file_tree>
frontend/

<action type="file" filePath="backend/models/property.py">
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from typing import List, Optional
from datetime import datetime
from enum import Enum


class PropertyType(str, Enum):
    APARTMENT = "apartment"
    HOUSE = "house"
    CONDO = "condo"
    VILLA = "villa"
    CABIN = "cabin"
    TOWNHOUSE = "townhouse"


class Amenity(str, Enum):
    WIFI = "wifi"
    KITCHEN = "kitchen"
    PARKING = "parking"
    POOL = "pool"
    GYM = "gym"
    AIR_CONDITIONING = "air_conditioning"
    HEATING = "heating"
    WASHER = "washer"
    DRYER = "dryer"
    TV = "tv"
    WORKSPACE = "workspace"
    PETS_ALLOWED = "pets_allowed"
    SMOKING_ALLOWED = "smoking_allowed"


class PropertyImage(BaseModel):
    url: str
    alt_text: Optional[str] = None
    is_primary: bool = False


class PropertyLocation(BaseModel):
    address: str
    city: str
    state: str
    country: str
    zip_code: str
    latitude: float
    longitude: float


class PropertyPricing(BaseModel):
    base_price: float = Field(..., ge=0)
    currency: str = "USD"
    cleaning_fee: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    service_fee: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    taxes: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    weekly_discount: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0, le=100)
    monthly_discount: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0, le=100)


class PropertyAvailability(BaseModel):
    start_date: datetime
    end_date: datetime
    minimum_stay: int = Field(default=1, ge=1)
    maximum_stay: Optional[int] = None


class PropertyHost(BaseModel):
    id: str
    name: str
    avatar_url: Optional[str] = None
    is_superhost: bool = False
    joined_date: datetime
    response_rate: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0, le=100)
    response_time: Optional[str] = None


class Property(BaseModel):
    id: str
    title: str
    description: str
    property_type: PropertyType
    property_subtype: Optional[str] = None
    max_guests: int = Field(..., ge=1)
    bedrooms: int = Field(..., ge=0)
    bathrooms: float = Field(..., ge=0)
    beds: int = Field(..., ge=0)
    square_feet: Optional[int] = None
    
    location: PropertyLocation
    pricing: PropertyPricing
    images: List[PropertyImage]
    amenities: List[Amenity]
    
    host: PropertyHost
    rating: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0, le=5)
    review_count: int = 0
    
    created_at: datetime
    updated_at: datetime
    is_active: bool = True
    
    class Config:
        use_enum_values = True


class PropertySummary(BaseModel):
    id: str
    title: str
    property_type: PropertyType
    max_guests: int
    bedrooms: int
    bathrooms: float
    
    location: PropertyLocation
    pricing: PropertyPricing
    primary_image: Optional[PropertyImage] = None
    
    rating: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0, le=5)
    review_count: int = 0
    is_superhost: bool = False
    
    class Config:
        use_enum_values = True
</action>

<action type="file" filePath="backend/models/search.py">
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from typing import List, Optional, Dict, Any
from datetime import datetime
from .property import PropertyType, Amenity


class SearchFilters(BaseModel):
    check_in: Optional[datetime] = None
    check_out: Optional[datetime] = None
    guests: int = Field(default=1, ge=1)
    min_price: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    max_price: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    property_types: List[PropertyType] = Field(default_factory=list)
    amenities: List[Amenity] = Field(default_factory=list)
    instant_book: bool = False
    superhost_only: bool = False
    min_bedrooms: Optional[int] = Field(None, ge=0)
    min_bathrooms: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    max_bedrooms: Optional[int] = Field(None, ge=0)
    max_bathrooms: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    allow_pets: bool = False
    allow_smoking: bool = False
    
    class Config:
        use_enum_values = True


class LocationBounds(BaseModel):
    north: float
    south: float
    east: float
    west: float


class SearchQuery(BaseModel):
    query: Optional[str] = None
    location: Optional[str] = None
    bounds: Optional[LocationBounds] = None
    center: Optional[Dict[str, float]] = None
    zoom: Optional[int] = Field(None, ge=1, le=20)
    filters: SearchFilters = Field(default_factory=SearchFilters)
    
    # Pagination
    page: int = Field(default=1, ge=1)
    per_page: int = Field(default=20, ge=1, le=100)
    
    # Sorting
    sort_by: str = Field(default="relevance")
    sort_order: str = Field(default="desc")


class SearchResult(BaseModel):
    properties: List[Any]  # Will be List[PropertySummary] in actual implementation
    total_count: int
    page: int
    per_page: int
    total_pages: int
    
    # Search metadata
    search_id: Optional[str] = None
    search_params: SearchQuery
    applied_filters: Dict[str, Any] = Field(default_factory=dict)
    
    # Location data for map
    map_bounds: Optional[LocationBounds] = None
    center: Optional[Dict[str, float]] = None
    
    # Facets for filtering
    price_range: Dict[str, float] = Field(default_factory=dict)
    property_type_counts: Dict[str, int] = Field(default_factory=dict)
    amenity_counts: Dict[str, int] = Field(default_factory=dict)


class SearchSuggestion(BaseModel):
    display_name: str
    location: Dict[str, float]
    type: str  # "city", "region", "country", "landmark"
    country: Optional[str] = None
    state: Optional[str] = None


class SearchSuggestions(BaseModel):
    query: str
    suggestions: List[SearchSuggestion]
    total_count: int


class PopularDestination(BaseModel):
    name: str
    country: str
    image_url: str
    property_count: int
    average_price: float
    rating: float
</action>

<action type="file" filePath="backend/services/search_service.py">
from fastapi import APIRouter, Query, HTTPException
from typing import List, Optional
from datetime import datetime, timedelta
import uuid
from ..models.property import Property, PropertySummary, PropertyType, Amenity
from ..models.search import SearchQuery, SearchResult, SearchSuggestions, SearchSuggestion, PopularDestination

router = APIRouter(prefix="/search", tags=["search"])

# Mock data for development
MOCK_PROPERTIES = [
    Property(
        id="prop_001",
        title="Stunning Downtown Loft with Skyline Views",

@router.get("/suggestions", response_model=SearchSuggestions)
async def get_search_suggestions(
    query: str = Query(..., min_length=2, max_length=100),
    limit: int = Query(default=5, ge=1, le=10)
):
    """Get search suggestions based on query string"""
    
    mock_suggestions = [
        SearchSuggestion(
            display_name="San Francisco, California",
            location={"lat": 37.7749, "lng": -122.4194},
            type="city",
            country="USA",
            state="California"
        ),
        SearchSuggestion(
            display_name="Los Angeles, California",
            location={"lat": 34.0522, "lng": -118.2437},
            type="city",
            country="USA",
            state="California"
        ),
        SearchSuggestion(
            display_name="Malibu, California",
            location={"lat": 34.0259, "lng": -118.7798},
            type="city",
            country="USA",
            state="California"
        )
    ]
    
    # Filter suggestions based on query
    filtered_suggestions = [
        s for s in mock_suggestions 
        if query.lower() in s.display_name.lower()
    ]
    
    return SearchSuggestions(
        query=query,
        suggestions=filtered_suggestions[:limit],
        total_count=len(filtered_suggestions)
    )


@router.post("/properties", response_model=SearchResult)
async def search_properties(search_query: SearchQuery):
    """Search for properties based on various criteria"""
    
    # Start with all properties
    results = MOCK_PROPERTIES
    
    # Filter by location if provided
    if search_query.location:
        location_lower = search_query.location.lower()
        results = [
            p for p in results 
            if location_lower in p.location.city.lower() or 
               location_lower in p.location.state.lower() or
               location_lower in p.location.country.lower()
        ]
    
    # Filter by guest count
    if search_query.filters.guests > 1:
        results = [p for p in results if p.max_guests >= search_query.filters.guests]
    
    # Filter by price range
    if search_query.filters.min_price is not None:
        results = [p for p in results if p.pricing.base_price >= search_query.filters.min_price]
    
    if search_query.filters.max_price is not None:
        results = [p for p in results if p.pricing.base_price <= search_query.filters.max_price]
    
    # Filter by property types
    if search_query.filters.property_types:
        results = [p for p in results if p.property_type in search_query.filters.property_types]
    
    # Filter by amenities
    if search_query.filters.amenities:
        for amenity in search_query.filters.amenities:
            results = [p for p in results if amenity in p.amenities]
    
    # Filter by superhost
    if search_query.filters.superhost_only:
        results = [p for p in results if p.host.is_superhost]
    
    # Filter by bedrooms/bathrooms
    if search_query.filters.min_bedrooms is not None:
        results = [p for p in results if p.bedrooms >= search_query.filters.min_bedrooms]
    
    if search_query.filters.max_bedrooms is not None:
        results = [p for p in results if p.bedrooms <= search_query.filters.max_bedrooms]
    
    if search_query.filters.min_bathrooms is not None:
        results = [p for p in results if p.bathrooms >= search_query.filters.min_bathrooms]
    
    if search_query.filters.max_bathrooms is not None:
        results = [p for p in results if p.bathrooms <= search_query.filters.max_bathrooms]
    
    # Convert to PropertySummary
    property_summaries = [
        PropertySummary(
            id=p.id,
            title=p.title,
            property_type=p.property_type,
            max_guests=p.max_guests,
            bedrooms=p.bedrooms,
            bathrooms=p.bathrooms,
            location=p.location,
            pricing=p.pricing,
            primary_image=p.images[0] if p.images else None,
            rating=p.rating,
            review_count=p.review_count,
            is_superhost=p.host.is_superhost
        )
        for p in results
    ]
    
    # Apply sorting
    if search_query.sort_by == "price_low":
        property_summaries.sort(key=lambda x: x.pricing.base_price)
    elif search_query.sort_by == "price_high":
        property_summaries.sort(key=lambda x: x.pricing.base_price, reverse=True)
    elif search_query.sort_by == "rating":
        property_summaries.sort(key=lambda x: x.rating or 0, reverse=True)
    elif search_query.sort_by == "newest":
        property_summaries.sort(key=lambda x: x.id, reverse=True)
    
    # Pagination
    total_count = len(property_summaries)
    total_pages = (total_count + search_query.per_page - 1) // search_query.per_page
    
    start_idx = (search_query.page - 1) * search_query.per_page
    end_idx = start_idx + search_query.per_page
    
    paginated_results = property_summaries[start_idx:end_idx]
    
    # Calculate facets
    price_range = {
        "min": min([p.pricing.base_price for p in results]) if results else 0,
        "max": max([p.pricing.base_price for p in results]) if results else 0
    }
    
    property_type_counts = {}
    for p in results:
        p_type = p.property_type.value
        property_type_counts[p_type] = property_type_counts.get(p_type, 0) + 1
    
    amenity_counts = {}
    for p in results:
        for amenity in p.amenities:
            amenity_str = amenity.value
            amenity_counts[amenity_str] = amenity_counts.get(amenity_str, 0) + 1
    
    return SearchResult(
        properties=paginated_results,
        total_count=total_count,
        page=search_query.page,
        per_page=search_query.per_page,
        total_pages=total_pages,
        search_id=str(uuid.uuid4()),
        search_params=search_query,
        applied_filters=search_query.filters.dict(exclude_unset=True),
        price_range=price_range,
        property_type_counts=property_type_counts,
        amenity_counts=amenity_counts
    )


@router.get("/popular-destinations", response_model=List[PopularDestination])
async def get_popular_destinations(limit: int = Query(default=6, ge=1, le=12)):
    """Get popular destinations for the homepage"""
    
    return [
        PopularDestination(
            name="San Francisco",
            country="USA",
            image_url="https://example.com/sf.jpg",
            property_count=1250,

@router.get("/property/{property_id}", response_model=Property)
async def get_property(property_id: str):
    """Get detailed information about a specific property"""
    
    property_obj = next((p for p in MOCK_PROPERTIES if p.id == property_id), None)
    
    if not property_obj:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Property not found")
    
    return property_obj
</action>

<action type="update_file" path="backend/models/search.py">
from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
from typing import List, Optional, Dict, Any
from datetime import datetime
from models.property import PropertyType, Amenity


class SearchFilters(BaseModel):
    check_in: Optional[datetime] = None
    check_out: Optional[datetime] = None
    guests: int = Field(default=1, ge=1)
    min_price: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    max_price: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    property_types: List[PropertyType] = Field(default_factory=list)
    amenities: List[Amenity] = Field(default_factory=list)
    instant_book: bool = False
    superhost_only: bool = False
    min_bedrooms: Optional[int] = Field(None, ge=0)
    min_bathrooms: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    max_bedrooms: Optional[int] = Field(None, ge=0)
    max_bathrooms: Optional[float] = Field(None, ge=0)
    allow_pets: bool = False
    allow_smoking: bool = False
    
    class Config:
        use_enum_values = True


class LocationBounds(BaseModel):
    north: float
    south: float
    east: float
    west: float


class SearchQuery(BaseModel):
    query: Optional[str] = None
    location: Optional[str] = None
    bounds: Optional[LocationBounds] = None
    center: Optional[Dict[str, float]] = None
    zoom: Optional[int] = Field(None, ge=1, le=20)
    filters: SearchFilters = Field(default_factory=SearchFilters)
    
    # Pagination
    page: int = Field(default=1, ge=1)
    per_page: int = Field(default=20, ge=1, le=100)
    
    # Sorting
    sort_by: str = Field(default="relevance")
    sort_order: str = Field(default="desc")


class SearchResult(BaseModel):
    properties: List[Any]  # Will be List[PropertySummary] in actual implementation
    total_count: int
    page: int
    per_page: int
    total_pages: int
    
    # Search metadata
    search_id: Optional[str] = None
    search_params: SearchQuery
    applied_filters: Dict[str, Any] = Field(default_factory=dict)
    
    # Location data for map
    map_bounds: Optional[LocationBounds] = None
    center: Optional[Dict[str, float]] = None
    
    # Facets for filtering
    price_range: Dict[str, float] = Field(default_factory=dict)
    property_type_counts: Dict[str, int] = Field(default_factory=dict)
    amenity_counts: Dict[str, int] = Field(default_factory=dict)


class SearchSuggestion(BaseModel):
    display_name: str
    location: Dict[str, float]
    type: str  # "city", "region", "country", "landmark"
    country: Optional[str] = None
    state: Optional[str] = None


class SearchSuggestions(BaseModel):
    query: str
    suggestions: List[SearchSuggestion]
    total_count: int


class PopularDestination(BaseModel):
    name: str
    country: str
    image_url: str
    property_count: int
    average_price: float
    rating: float
</action>
